WRITING.TITLE: Is God Punishing my loved ones for my sins?
WRITING.TEXT: My fellow Brothers and Sisters in God The Father and In Jesus Christ the Son of God, Back in October 2019 my best friend crashed with his bike and hit his head and ever since,he has been in the hospital,he was doing well but the doctors had to perfrom surgery and he contracted Menigitis,after that it took him a few months for his body to function as better as it could,and he was seemingly doing fine,but i learned recently that he contracted a respiratory disease but he fought it off,anyways my point is,ever since High-school i am struggling with the sins starting with the letter M and P,throughout that period 2014-2019 my father,my godfather,my uncle and my grandfather have all died,did God do it to punish me for my sins? i am trying my best to stop sin but i fall and do it again please help

WRITING.TEXT: Hello my brethren in God The Father And in Jesus Christ The Son of God, I am a Greek orthodox Christian and I am a little confused about prayer, I sometimes pray to God The Father including in my prayer"In the name of Jesus Christ Thy Son"and when I fear God doesn't hear my prayer because of my sins I pray to Lord Jesus Christ Who sacrificed Himself and resurrected so He could bridge the divide between God and man, back to my question, I believe in both God The Father and Our Lord Jesus Christ The Son of God but who do I pray to? To our Lord or to God? Is it forbidden because of our sins to pray directly to God?
That is what's confusing me because a verse says''I Am The Way The Truth The Life no one goes to The Father except through Me' '

I have been a Christian ever since elementary I don't go to church except for when I want to light a candle and I have little knowledge of the Bible but I believe and trust in God The Father And Our Lord Jesus Christ because of my experiences I fall more often than not and I also have struggled with my faith countless times but every time I am about to lose my faith God and Our Lord always find a way to bring me back

WRITING.TITLE: Confession

My brethren in Jesus Christ and God The Father, with great sadness and hatred i confess that i am a sinner and no matter how much i pray to keep it under control i keep falling a day later,i hate myself for keeping on sinning and falling away from God and Our Lord,i don't deserve Their Love and i fear They are furious with me,i also fear that because of my sins my best friend's survival chances now that he is in the hospital are thinning.Also despite my hatred for myself and my sins i feel hollow,has God left me to my sins because there is no hope for me?

WRITING.TITLE: Two questions
WRITING.TEXT: 1)my best friend who's the closest thing I have to a brother(I also have 3 sisters and a stepsister ) crashed his bike a few months ago and hit his head really bad,did God cause the accident because of my norp and m addiction? 2)he is alive but he gets respiratory infections often due to the treatments and I fear for his life and how much more he can take, is God going to take him away just to take revenge on me? P. S. I still backslide and I don't like it

Norp is an anagram for adult movies I dislike it but it's a strong addiction that I can't find a way out of I am willing to forgive anyone but is it a sin to cut ties with a person who forces you against the wall leaving you with no breathing room? (overburdening you with their problems and whining ) Anyways I pray for God and Our Lord to keep him alive and help him pull through,he has been in this condition for months and if he is alive God must have a reason but I also fear that God will take him away just to punish me for the aforementioned sin

I understand but I am afraid because it's been months since The accident and he has contracted a lot of respiratory diseases throughout his treatment, thankfully he is no longer in the icu but still I fear that God The Father And me have different opinions, I mean what if I want my sworn brother to make it out of this alive and God The Father thinks the better outcome is the worst case scenario so I can stop sinning?

Yeah but what happens after that? For all these months he is in God's hands, sure God might have a reason for keeping him alive but I fear every day that God will unleash His wrath at my bro for my falling into habitual sin

It's a dreadful thought because I've been sinning ever since 2012 though I do stop when my mind is clear and follow God and Our Lord for as long as possible, but in the end no matter how much I try to control my sin I fall again, and combine it with the fact that my father died in 2012 during the period of time I fell into sin and then my godfather died, then my grandfather then my uncle(the latter two after years) , and a friend of mine also lost her father I fear I am the one that brought them misfortune because i sinned If you are wondering what my sin is it is watching adult movies and doing you know what it's a difficult addiction to stop

Thank you, I know Who God and Our Lord are and I believe who They Say They Are when my mind is clear and I haven't sinned but whenever I fall into sin my mind and heart and soul get clouded with regret and sadness and selfloathing for falling away and I can't think clearly especially now that my sworn brother is in the hospital and I fall into sin I know I must stop sinning and I truly wish to reconcile with The Heavenly Father and Our Lord

Don't worry about it I do doubt some times but when I am so crushed by the sorrow and self loathing and I am at the breaking point of faith I put my faith in God and Our Lord completely and a miracle always happens

WRITING.TITLE: Question about saints
WRITING.TEXT: I am a Greek Christian orthodox and nearly all my life Ever since I was 5,6 or 7 years old (23 at the moment) I've believed in God The Father And Our Lord Jesus Christ The Son of God and from my experiences I believe they are the absolute Truth, I don't read the Bible but I do read verses that help me follow The Lord and what He taught and also verses that help me strengthen my faith and belief in God The Father, as for the church I rarely go unless I want to cross myself and pray or to light a candle for prayers, anyways here is the question I am not sure about saints so I trust and believe only in God The Father And Our Lord Jesus Christ The Son of God Our Saviour, can I still be saved if I don't believe in saints?

To be a Saint means to be in heaven exactly upon your death and there are differing thoughts on what exactly happens so its difficult to say, that's why I am not sure about the saints I only trust God and Our Lord

When did I say that I want to do the bare minimum to be saved? I only want to love and trust in God The Father And Our Lord Jesus Christ The Son of God and Our Saviour and grow closer to them as well as live a Christ like life, loving everyone and being forgiving and believing in God and Our Lord, is it wrong to only follow Them? I believe in God and Our Lord due to my experiences with Them, nothing else matters to me.
And don't say don't lean into your own understanding because I don't lean into my own understanding I trust in God The Father And Our Lord Jesus Christ The Son of God and Our Saviour

God The Father And Our Lord Jesus Christ The Son of God and Our Saviour don't reveal Themselves only to the ultra religious churchgoing everyday Bible readers, They Reveal Themselves to the low key not regular Bible readers and not regular church goer Christians, low-key Christians like myself suffer the most in spiritual warfare, we are more likely to sin and doubt and fall into the depths of self destruction and selfloathing but throughout my life when I was at my breaking point and I was about to stop believing They always picked me up and set me on Their path, that's why I believe and love God and Our Lord and that's why I Trust Them and only Them, you are not in a position to judge me, only God and Our Lord can do that, if you are right and I will go to hell for not going to the church and reading the entire Bible then Loving God and Our Lord and trusting Them until the end and living a normal life loving everyone and believing is not enough.

I fear that I won't or can't understand God The Father And Our Lord but from both my experiences and from what little I've read about Them from the Bible verses They Truly Love us, and that's enough for me to follow Them and Love and Trust Them until the end, every question I have asked and prayed to Them they have answered sooner or later God's timing is not our timing and from my experiences I learned to Trust in God The Father And Our Lord I don't read the Bible in its entirety and I don't go to church most of the time but I pray all day everyday for Their mercy and Love and I pray that I Trust Them and I ask that They show me the way to Them and They do

Thank you my friend and brethren in God The Father and Jesus Christ The Son of God and Our Lord and Saviour, in fact I have three questions 1)my sworn brother is in the hospital for 7 months due to him crashing his bike and I blame my sins for the accident that it was God's way of chastening(is this the right word?) me for my sin, it has also happened before in the past most males from my paternal and step-paternal family side have all passed and I fear this happened because I sinned 2)Are my sins affecting my sworn brother's chances of survival and how can I trust God in this difficult situation? 3)i succumbed to sin again and stopped sinning last Thursday, my sworn brother entered hospital again on Monday due to burning up, are these two events related?

WRITING.TITLE: Something weird is going on and i am freaking out
WRITING.TEXT: Hello everyone,i am a student in I.T. and because of the COVID-19 we are reduced to online lessons,not that it bothers me because it is the basis of I.T. to use the computer for studying and learning all there is to it,but truth is,now it bothers me,let me start at the beginning. A month ago we were supposed to have our final online lesson before starting school and work(i'm in a student program for ages between 18-25 they also provide us with work for 2 years)but our teacher never sent us the link to the lesson,we tried calling his cellphone but the line was dead,we haven't heard from him for two weeks,that's where things start to get creepy,i got an email two fridays ago for an I.T. lesson and i was the only participant,i was weirded out because not only was i the only participant but there was no sender,to my idiocy i actually clicked the agree button and when it was time for the lesson i joined in but there was no one there,my camera was only showing me,i tried calling my classmates but their lines were busy,i sticked around for 15 minutes and when i saw no one joined i left and went to sleep. When i woke up i had a headache and went to the bathroom to take a painkiller but when i looked at the mirror i saw strange red symbols on the wall but when i looked behind me i didn't see anything and i thought it was a post-sleep hallucination because when i looked at the mirror everything was back to normal,i didn't give it too much thought back then but things escalated for the worse after this. After that day my headaches grew worse and due to the quarantine i thought i was losing my mind,when i looked at my mirror again i saw blood everywhere,on the walls,on the furniture,everywhere,the more days passed the worse my head started hurting,and only last friday did things start becoming threatening,when i looked in the mirror i didn't see my reflection i saw something else,it was a buff reptilian skeletal creature with black holes for eyes and mouth but it matched my movements on the mirror,i ran out of the bathroom and tried to get out of my house but i couldn't find my keys and i haven't found them since and now i can't unlock the door,the windows are out of the question because i live at the fourth floor of the building so i would be jumping to my death. It's been a horrible week,my reflection went back to normal after that incident and there is no blood in the mirror anymore,but that's not what freaks me out, ever since this week started i've been hearing a weird clanking noise near midnight as if something is being dragged around,and it's getting closer,last night i heard the noise and it's just right next door,i am afraid to look through the doorhole and an awful odor is coming from the building,i fear whatever is out there has killed my neighbours and i am next,i just heard the clanking noise outside my door,i'm going to hide,if you hear a clanking noise outside your door,don't open it,good luck.
